entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
